snippet: The United States national team found itself in peril of early elimination Friday night until a late second half goal from Eddie Johnson secured the win over Antigua and Barbuda.
abstract: United States men's soccer team defeats Antigua and Barbuda in World Cup qualifying match.
lead_paragraph: The United States national team found itself in peril of early elimination Friday night until a late second half goal from Eddie Johnson secured the win over Antigua and Barbuda.

headline.seo: United States Beats Antigua and Barbuda in World Cup Qualifier
headline.main: Late Goal Eases Pressure on U.S. in World Cup Qualifying
headline.print_headline: Late Goal Eases Pressure on U.S. in World Cup Qualifying
